subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] box use concerns.
author: Wiliam Clarke
full_text:
--0-828080188-1209050289=:32760
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I think it is all an alter ego problem, certain people think they are blessed to have one of your boxes.  Hell I could only wish to have one myself, but I know that their is not enough to go around, and also know that I probably will never be able to get one.  So I'm content to have my Radio Shack Hack, without the ego problem.  That's fine with me, I feel great about being a member of this group, and making some friends.  Maybe some day I might be able to use what I learn from y'all to build something for myself.  
   
  Later Guys, and have a great day
   
  William Rees    
  

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           Hi All; We have been warned by others from time to time about unbridled box use, as it supposedly brings in negativity. I don't want to believe that, but there are a few cases of people using boxes made by me, as well as the hack radios, and going whacko big time. Its' either all ego--I'm the onlyest one that can use this, or like the more recent example. I don't know if these people were like this to start, or if it's an external influance, but it's discouraging. There seems to be a similar reaction with systems not made by me--so I've been told.
 
 Soooo, maybe burn some white candles, and maybe get a Rosary. My guys talk about the Catholics, and the Purple Princess has a Catholic connection on the etheric levels, although the church imposes too many limits on her. I wouldn't want to go into a state of fear, but a little protection stuff couldn't hurt. 
 
 Not only do I not have the time to mass produce boxes, I'm beginning to think it's not a good idea anyway. 
 
 Frank-S
 
 

  
---------------------------------
  Express yourself wherever you are. Mobilize!   

                           


       
---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile.  Try it now.
